name: Venom heroes vs Spider heroes
description:
This story about the anti-hero Venom, who took the path of evil and decided to destroy all the spiders of heroes in the city. You have to fight with the incredible heroes who are guarding this city. A lot of spider heroes will try to prevent you, but you are the best among them. Hero Venom is a powerful mixture of the hero's spider with an incredible hero, and to become such a long time he trained. But this story is not about evil, but about how the evil hero will become kind and finally take his place in the list of savior of mankind.

Play this game you will pass the way from the villain to the superhero and you will show the world that even such a terrible name as a hero of the Venom can be good.

Features of the game Heroes of Venom vs Spiders heroes:
1. Play as a black hero Venom!
2. Fight spiders with superheroes!
3. Explore the great world!
4. Realistic physics of cars!
